apple.clientIdDescription: Apple Service ID, available from Apple Developer Portal
apple.clientSecretDescription: Private key content (.p8 file) for authenticating with Apple
apple.enableDescription: When enabled, users can sign in with their Apple ID
apple.keyIdDescription: Your private key ID from Apple Developer Portal
apple.redirectUriDescription: API address for redirect URL after successful Apple authentication. Do not end with /
apple.title: Apple Sign-In

device.blockVirtualMachineDescription: Block virtual machine login, only allow real device
device.communicationKeyDescription: The key used for secure communication between application and server
device.enableDescription: When enabled, users can sign in with device
device.enableSecurityDescription: When enabled, application requests must carry communication key
device.showAdsDescription: When enabled, ads will be shown
device.title: Device Sign-In

email.emailSuffixWhitelistDescription: Only allow emails from whitelisted domains
email.emailVerificationDescription: Require email verification for new users
email.enableDescription: When enabled, users can sign in with email
email.senderAddressDescription: The email address that appears in the From field
email.sendTestEmailDescription: Send a test email to verify your SMTP configuration
email.smtpEncryptionMethodDescription: Enable SSL/TLS encryption for SMTP connection

type.conditionalSyntax: Use conditional syntax to display different content

email.title: Email Settings

facebook.clientIdDescription: Facebook App ID, available from Facebook Developer Portal
facebook.clientSecretDescription: Facebook App Secret, available from Facebook Developer Portal
facebook.enableDescription: When enabled, users can sign in with their Facebook account
facebook.title: Facebook Sign-In

github.clientIdDescription: GitHub OAuth App Client ID, available from GitHub Developer Settings
github.clientSecretDescription: GitHub OAuth App Client Secret, available from GitHub Developer Settings
github.enableDescription: When enabled, users can sign in with their GitHub account
github.title: GitHub Sign-In

google.clientIdDescription: Google OAuth Client ID, available from Google Cloud Console
google.clientSecretDescription: Google OAuth Client Secret, available from Google Cloud Console
google.enableDescription: When enabled, users can sign in with their Google account
google.title: Google Sign-In

phone.enableTip: When enabled, users can sign in with their phone number
phone.templateTip: Use {{code}} variable for the verification code
phone.testSmsTip: Send a test SMS to verify configuration
phone.title: SMS Settings
phone.whitelistAreaCodeTip: Enter area codes separated by commas
phone.whitelistValidationTip: Only allow phone numbers with whitelisted area codes

telegram.enableDescription: When enabled, users can sign in with their Telegram account
telegram.title: Telegram Sign-In
